org.jetel.ctl

Class CodePieceExtractor.PositionedString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.CodePieceExtractor.PositionedString
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodePieceExtractor.SyntacticPositionedString
    Enclosing class:
    CodePieceExtractor

    public static class CodePieceExtractor.PositionedString
extends java.lang.Object
    Returns pieces of input string indexed by start line, start column, end line, end column.
